content: I am an undergrad looking at doing research this summer at the University of Michigan. Are there any professors there known for liking Lean? Thanks!
Karen Smith and I have had some discussions about lean although I don't think she's a lean user, more just lean-interested.
She might know a better answer to your question though (she's not on this zulip AFAIK)
This topic was moved here from #job postings > Anyone at the University of Michigan? by Patrick Massot.
